attributes.action: Give an opportunity for young adults to speak directly to the Prime Minister about the issues that trouble them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently, the PM provided an opportunity for mother's to talk to the PM about their issues.

Please provide the opportunity for the same for students and young adults.

rejection.details: You may be interested to know that the Prime Minister participated in a Bebo webchat with young people.  Here is a link to the story:  http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19924
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
